column5: Hey fellas I'll be up in the kapuskasing area for the next ten days. I'll have an extra seat in the boat if anyone wants to join me and the missus would like to find some other lakes in the area. I know there's lots of fish in the lake we're staying on but a change of scenery would be cool.  Shoot me a pm if you want to get out, or would like a friendly north vs south competition.
